Spells.name: Shield
Spells.description: Conjure a non-chocolate magic shell to cover you or your ally for 10 seconds or until it is depleted. Blocks 2 damage on each incoming attack up to 10 damage total.

Spells.name: Fireball
Spells.description: Sling some minor fire at your enemies for straight damage. Something around 6 damage.

Spells.name: Light
Spells.description: Emit light from something like your wand, weirdo. Can light up dark rooms for 10 minutes.
